definition: to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc

sentences.english: I was sitting in the right seat and saw two fighters.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在右邊駕駛席上，看到兩架戰鬥機。
